description: Open Knowledge Foundation (OKFN) is a global, non-profit network that promotes and shares information at no charge, including both content and data.  It was founded by Rufus Pollock in 2004 in Cambridge, UK.  It is incorporated in England and Wales as a company limited by guarantee.  Between May 2016 and May 2019 the organisation was named Open Knowledge International, but decided in May 2019 to return to Open Knowledge Foundation.
name: Open Knowledge Foundation (OKFN)
